parameters.description: The ID of the chat completion to delete.
parameters.name: completion_id

deleted.description: Whether the chat completion was deleted.

id.description: The ID of the chat completion that was deleted.

object.description: The type of object being deleted.

200.description: The chat completion was deleted successfully.

summary:
Delete a stored chat completion. Only Chat Completions that have been
created with the `store` parameter set to `true` can be deleted.
